author: Reuters
title: China reports 46 new coronavirus cases, up from 42 a day earlier
description: Mainland China's tally of infections now stands at 81,953. The death toll rose by three to 3,339.
content:
China on Saturday reported a rise in new coronavirus cases, as authorities try to head off a second wave of COVID-19, particularly from imported and asymptomatic infections, as city and travel restrictions are lifted.
The National Health Commission said 46 n… [+1309 chars]
